newsitem.title: UK: Cantab to present warts drug data in Dec.
newsitem.headline: Cantab to present warts drug data in Dec.

text.p: U.K. biotech group Cantab Pharmaceuticals Plc said on Monday that it will present intermediate clinical trial data on its genital warts treatment TA-GW in early December.
Cambridge-based Cantab signed an agreement with SmithKline Beecham Plc to jointly develop TA-GW in July.
SmithKline is funding remaining development costs for the drug, which promises to break new ground in the treatment of genital warts -- a common sexually-transmitted condition.
SmithKline has worldwide marketing rights to the product, which is based on Cantab's work into the human pappillomavirus.
The company said in a statement it will present results from Phase IIa trials of TA-GW at a conference in Brisbane, Australia, from December 1 to 9.
Cantab will announce its third-quarter results and a research update on November 29.
